https://tmrev.io/movie/1020828-Daisy Petal Game 2 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vWxaAOlSf8RFU9MsRSYVXTV4Lg0.jpg A three-film cassette, "Daisy Petal Game 2" looks at three different lifetimes where a person is forced to make decisions that will affect the rest of their lives. Such moments come as suddenly and dramatically as the first falling in love. How to deal with these crises in youth, early middle age and golden years? Daisy Petal Game 2
